name: Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity
description:
Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity is an action-RPG game developed by Alfa System. It came out on 24-02-2011. It was published by SEGA. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity is available on PSP.
It was produced by Satoshi Sakai and Tetsuya Sasaki. Yuya Kimura directed the game. It was scored by Fumie Kumatani, Hideaki Kobayashi and Kenichi Tokoi.
